thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com | 12 of 178
thread.title: Graham Allison

author: Graham Allison
title: Graham Allison
text:
Trusted Housesitters is an easy to use website but that doesn't mean we weren't worried in the beginning. Weirdly, the process reminds me of online dating websites from 10 years ago. You basically have to trust that people are basically good. After all you are giving them a key to your house and free access to all of your possessions! The process could be open to abuse on both sides which is what happened to online dating so hopefully TrustedHousesitters will have a solution to that particularly for new sitters who haven't yet been reviewed. Maybe some insurance?
The website seems to have thought about most things including creating a welcome pack, calendars and flexibility to contact available sitters. The whole site is very intuitive and works across browsers. We have had a great first experience and have already booked our Housesitter again!
